The father is still the breadwinner in most families but 62% of the mothers said that they work with 62% of them having full time jobs.Almost all said the sole effect on the family of this is that they have a higher standard of living.The traditional wife's job's in the home such as cleaning,cooking & ironing are still her preserve.Others,such as gardening & decorating are shared between husband & wife.37% of the families send the car to a garage for repairs.
